alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 4:56AM AKST until December 16 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and very cold wind chills expected. Plan on areas of poor visibilities to create difficult travel conditions at times. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Wind chill values as cold as 50 below zero are expected. * WHERE...near Passes. * WHEN...9 PM this evening to 9 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
